mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.coupon_type AS "couponType", a.coupon_name AS "couponName", a.expiry_time AS "expiryTime", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.limit_amount AS "limitAmount", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.transfer_expiry_time AS "transferExpiryTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_config( id, coupon_type, coupon_name, expiry_time, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, limit_amount, remarks, transfer_expiry_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{couponType}, #{couponName}, #{expiryTime}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{limitAmount}, #{remarks}, #{transferExpiryTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon_config SET coupon_type = #{couponType}, coupon_name = #{couponName}, expiry_time = #{expiryTime}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, limit_amount = #{limitAmount}, remarks = #{remarks}, transfer_expiry_time = #{transferExpiryTime} WHERE id = #{id}
